column5: i got used to the xmas stuff on the forum, but my 5 yr old was watching me and noticed that x-mas was still going strong over here! so who still has the x-mas tree up at home?
Mine ends when the Mailman delivers my credit-card bills..
Our tree just came down a few days ago.  Would have been sooner, but we were out of town from Dec 27th until Jan 4th.  When we got back we were all sick...so it took longer than usual!
I'm thinking Rick might be in charge of the Christmas theme but given his health issues we may have to give him a break.  Dan

For me it ends January 1st. Thats when everything comes down, inside and out.  The board is still looking Christmasy though.  I suppose if you are in a giving mood, Christmas can go on all year round.
scroll wayyyy down to the bottom of the screen and thereare options for changing the board skins....I have mine set to...OFC Club
i'll keep this skin as it saves me from the "double click", as for home tree came down on the 30th of dec. decorations for a bout a week after, lights outside wont be till spring lol
Time to get the Easter Bunny motif going on there Admin Dudes!!!!
My tree usually comes down once the cats try to scale it; the poor plastic bugger is lucky to make it to Boxing Day.
It's over whenever my wife takes the Christmas Tree down. This year it was within a couple of days of New Years Day. Came home one day and it was gone
Our Christmas is January 6 so the tree and lights stay till then plus a few days after.
My Christmas tree came down one night at 2:30 in the morning when I came out for a water and smelled HOT plastic.   Curt
What and skip right past Valentines Day ?
My tree is still up. If it were up to me, we'd pick either throw it away and never use it, or just keep it up all year. I hate lugging the thing out and putting it away. Bah-Humbug!
